name: Soviet Car Crash Derby Racing
description:
Soviet Car Crash Derby a racing game with cars from the Soviet Union

Your goal is to pass your way from the bottom of rustic area and settlement, Moscow Red Square and many others!


Advise fasten your sit belts and smash all enemies to win!

Features:
- Car racing game with damage effect
- AI smart technology
- Real car's physics
- Beautiful graphics
- Designed for a good display on devices with low and high resolutions (including tablets)
